title: a few interactive demos
content:
Hello all.  
My primary interest is interactive design and to that end using 3d space, motion, and type.  
Here's some of my more recent experiments that I hope you like!  
[Flash player required]

[http://www.lamberta.org/demo/pv3d/thoughtsyntax/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200305/http:/www.lamberta.org/demo/pv3d/thoughtsyntax/ "http://www.lamberta.org/demo/pv3d/thoughtsyntax/")

Not strictly type, but hey what is?  
 [http://www.lamberta.org/demo/pv3d/arrive/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200305/http:/www.lamberta.org/demo/pv3d/arrive/ "http://www.lamberta.org/demo/pv3d/arrive/")

And then there is my home page, (I'm really not trying to spam you)  
 [http://www.lamberta.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200305/http:/www.lamberta.org/ "http://www.lamberta.org/")

See ya!  
Billy
